select i.id, i.name, i.params, i.pro_detail_id, che.type che_type,che.check_status che_check_status,che.content_id che_content_id from inquiry i left join sys_pro_detail pro on i.pro_detail_id = pro.id left join quote q on i.id=q.inquiry_id left join sys_pro_check che on q.id = che.content_id
i.is_active = 1 and pro.is_active = 1 and q.is_active = 1
and pro.id = #{proDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and che.check_status = 0
and che.check_status != 0
order by che.content_id

select i.id, i.name, i.params,i.number,i.price,i.total_price, i.pro_detail_id, che.type che_type,che.check_status che_check_status from inquiry i left join sys_pro_detail pro on i.pro_detail_id = pro.id left join quote q on i.id=q.inquiry_id left join sys_pro_check che on q.id = che.content_id
i.is_active = 1 and pro.is_active = 1 and q.is_active = 1 and che.type = '比价审核'
and pro.id = #{proDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and che.check_status != 0
GROUP BY i.id, i.name, i.params,i.number,i.price,i.total_price, i.pro_detail_id, che.type,che.check_status
